name: A letter of love
description:
A Letter of Love

She is going for good and there is nothing you can do… everything you wanted to said, now is your last chance, go get that old typewriter of yours and write that message your heart needs to said.

Run after her! We believe in you.

How to play
  • Drag and drop the letter you need.
  • Press spacebar to type the letter.
  • Change letters and keep going.
  • Run with spacebar and catch her before she leaves.

 

This game was made by Narwhalcorn, a two man army for the Game Maker’s Toolkit Game Jam 2019. 

The theme: Only one.
